xdsl_modem_managedBy_description: You can configure the modem either in the Control Panel or from its internal interface. By enabling modem configuration from the Control Panel, you will disable its internal interface.
xdsl_modem_managedBy_warning: Warning: the configuration can only be managed from a single interface.
xdsl_modem_managedBy_warning_override: Warning: enabling remote configuration will remove the current modem settings.
xdsl_modem_managedBy_really_on: Are you sure you want to enable remote configuration?
xdsl_modem_managedBy_really_off: Are you sure you want to disable remote configuration?
